name: Serious Sam: The Second Encounter
description: Dynamically linked native version using assets from the Humble Bundle "Serious Sam Classic" Windows version.

files.file2: N/A:Please select the Linux installer downloaded from www.liflg.org/?catid=6&gameid=71

merge.src: $CACHE/drive_c/Program Files/Serious Sam Classic - The Second Encounter

content:
exe: ssamtse
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the Humble archive
- file2: N/A:Please select the Linux installer downloaded from www.liflg.org/?catid=6&gameid=71
- file3: https://gist.github.com/FakeShemp/9498f37525d2e6edd8d1e64899223f8e/archive/d6162529586a40ae381c5c24d1ec3a4c11fc9c37.zip
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $file1
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /S
    executable: $CACHE/Setup.exe
    name: wine.wineexec
    prefix: $CACHE
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/drive_c/Program Files/Serious Sam Classic - The Second Encounter
- execute:
    args: --tar -xf -C $CACHE
    file: $file2
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    file: $CACHE/bins.tar.bz2
    nomerge: true
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $CACHE/bins.tar.bz2
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/Data
    src: $CACHE/Data
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/Levels
    src: $CACHE/Levels
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    file: $file3
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/ssamtse
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/Bin/libEntities.so
    src: $CACHE/libEntitiesMP.so
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/Bin/libGame.so
    src: $CACHE/libGameMP.so
